pages.title: Casing
pages.text: Casing blocks are the fundamental building blocks of the Reprocessor.$(br2)They are essential for constructing its frame and are also used to craft the other parts. Additionally, casing blocks can be used to fill the faces of the Reprocessor if you prefer not to use glass.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() they are required to build the frame$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
